description:
Welcome to Sardinia, the largest island in the Mediterranean Sea that belongs to Italy. It is known for its stunning coastlines with crystal-clear blue waters and idyllic beaches. In this short episode, we will take you to the most beautiful beaches: the blue beaches of Costa Smeralda! Put on your bathing suit and let’s go!

For an unparalleled VR Travel viewing experience, download our "*TriptoVR*" app for your Meta Quest or mobile VR player. Find the app on the *Meta Quest* store here.

https://www.meta.com/experiences/6447684138675693/

Or on the *Pico Global* store here.

https://store-global.picoxr.com/global/detail/1/7291747813258477574

*Get the TriptoVR app in the Playstore or Appstore under these links.*

Appstore: https://apps.apple.com/app/triptovr/id6451488055
Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HetAmsterdamsFilmbedrijf.Triptovr&pcampaignid=web_share

If you are interested in *licensing* this or other 360° VR videos we have made or wish to create n
title: Sardinia: VR Tour of the Blue Beaches of Costa Smeralda - 8K 360 3D VR
